LanguageData.Cat.label: кіт
LanguageData.Cat.description: One of mankind's first pets, the cat is a small mammal which hunts vermin. Known for their aloofness, cats are nevertheless popular companions because of their independence, calm disposition, and fine, pettable fur.
LanguageData.Cat.tools.left_claw.label: ліва лапа
LanguageData.Cat.tools.right_claw.label: права лапа
LanguageData.Cat.tools.head.label: голова
LanguageData.Husky.label: хаскі
LanguageData.Husky.description: A large, energetic dog with a thick fur coat for remaining comfortable in arctic environments.
LanguageData.Husky.tools.left_claw.label: ліва лапа
LanguageData.Husky.tools.right_claw.label: права лапа
LanguageData.Husky.tools.head.label: голова
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.label: лабрадор ретривер
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.description: A very versatile, medium-sized dog. Originally bred to retrieve birds shot on the hunt, the lab is also an excellent guard dog, play pal, and family friend.
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.left_claw.label: ліва лапа
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.right_claw.label: права лапа
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.tools.head.label: голова
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.label: йоркширський тер'єр
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.description: A small, even-tempered dog. Originally bred to hunt rats, it later became a show and companionship animal. Some consider it useless, but the mood boost it gives by nuzzling can outweight the cost of feeding it.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.left_claw.label: ліва лапа
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.right_claw.label: права лапа
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.tools.head.label: голова
